document_data.name: Rite of the First Blooding
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rite of the First Blooding''' was a ceremony involving newborns<ref group="note">It remains unclear in the text whether the term "newborn" refers to an infant or just a new follower of Nobanion. who were welcomed into the fellowship of [[Nobanion]], King of [[Lion]]s.
document_data.Description: As part of the [[Newborn Celebration]], a festival celebrating the birth of Nobanion, newborn participants of the Rite of the First Blooding had their right hand or paw placed in the blood of a prey animal killed during a celebratory hunt. The newborn was then blessed by a priest of Nobanion called a [[Firemane]].
document_data.Location: This ceremony occurred within the [[Vilhon Reach]] during the month of [[Kythorn]].
